title: GCP Notebook Scheduler
description: GCP Notebook Scheduler Plugin Settings Schema

gcsBucket.title: GCS Bucket path
gcsBucket.description: Top-level GCS Bucket path where Notebooks will be written to

schedulerRegion.title: Cloud Scheduler region
schedulerRegion.description: Region where the AppEngine app is deployed for the projectId (https://cloud.google.com/scheduler/docs/#supported_regions)

jobRegion.title: AI Platform Job region
jobRegion.description: Region where the AI Platfrom training job will execute the notebook. (https://cloud.google.com/ai-platform/training/docs/regions)

scaleTier.title: AI Platform Job Scale tier
scaleTier.description: Scale tier used for the AI Platform training job. (https://cloud.google.com/ai-platform/training/docs/machine-types#scale_tiers)

containerImage.title: Container image
containerImage.description: Docker container used in the AI Platform training job. (https://cloud.google.com/ai-platform/training/docs/containers-overview)

oAuthClientId.title: OAuth 2.0 client ID
oAuthClientId.description: OAuth 2.0 Client ID for authenticating end-users for API requests
